Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::DistanceToMarker< T >

Distance between markers expected positions and reference markers positions.

This is used as cost function for the marker to joints problem.

This function takes a robot configuration as input. Using JointToMarker function, it computes where the markers would be in this particular configuration. Then it computes the distance between the current position and the expected, constant, ones. The reference positions are determined when this function is built.

Input: robot configuration (size: 6 + number of DOFs) Output: cost (size: 1)

Template Parameters:
TFunction traits type
